note.title: Bonus Actions
note.text: • List other bonus action features here
If you use a bonus action to cast a spell, the only spell you may cast using your action in the same turn is a cantrip.

note.title: Concentration
note.text: The following spells require concentration. IF you cast another spell which requires concentration while concentrating, your first spell ends. If you take damage, you must make a Constitution saving throw to maintain concentration. The save DC is 10, or 1/2 of the damage taken, whichever is higher.
